availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Harrison Keith (Plymouth, Massachussetts, salesman and soldier (U.S.A.))

body.p: Plymouth, Massachusetts, salesman and soldier. Massachusetts native. Son of Lewis Keith and Asaba Keith. Resident of Plymouth County, Massachusetts, in 1850. Salesman in Plymouth County in 1860. Upholsterer in Massachusetts in 1862. Served as a private in the 29th Massachusetts Infantry from January 1862 to December 1862. Listed as "deserted" in June 1863.
